attributes.action: All and any offers for Nigel Farrage to represent the UK to be declined.
attributes.additional_details: This insignificant man has been given a platform by the news media, such that he has been able to propagate significant, and potentially dangerous, division in our society.
attributes.background: Mr Farrage may be the (allegedly temporary) leader of his party and a Euro MP, but he has no brief from the people of the UK or its Parliament to be our representative with the incoming US government.
